actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 403 (b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit the continuation of family fares; to authorize reduced rate transportation for handicapped persons and their attendants; and to authorize reduced-rate transportation for elderly people and young people on a space-availability basis.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize air carriers to grant reduced rates on a space-available basis to: (1) families; (2) handicapped persons and attendants accompanying them; (3) persons 21 years of age or younger; and (4) persons 65 years of age or older.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 403 (b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit the continuation of family fares; to authorize reduced rate transportation for handicapped persons and their attendants; and to authorize reduced-rate transportation for elderly people and young people on a space-availability basis.
